page.title: 09MY DAD'S WORKING DAY
page.content: My dad gets up about 6.15a.m. and has some breakfast,usually a bowl of cereal.After getting shaved,washed and dressed he would normally leave between 7.15-7.30 depending on whether he walks or cycles. It is a distance of three miles to dad's office building in Aldershot,at which he arrives at about 8.00a.m.The mornings are usually spent doing paper work,stopping for a mid morning coffee around 10.00a.m. His lunch is taken in the staff resturant at 12.30-1.15p.m.The afternoons uusually consist of traveling to on site surveys anywhere between Farnborough and Alton, returning any time up to 5.00p.m.He arrives home at 7.30-7.45p.m. and has some tea,normally salad or a snack.He watches television until 10.30p.m. when he goes to bed.
